products.name: Artisan Leather Messenger Bag
products.description: Handcrafted full-grain leather messenger bag with brass hardware. Features multiple compartments and adjustable strap for everyday elegance.

products.name: Minimalist Ceramic Coffee Set
products.description: Japanese-inspired ceramic coffee set including pour-over dripper, two cups, and serving tray. Perfect for the coffee connoisseur.

products.name: Premium Wireless Headphones
products.description: Studio-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium comfort padding.

products.name: Organic Cotton Throw Blanket
products.description: Luxuriously soft organic cotton throw blanket in neutral tones. Sustainably sourced and ethically made.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Double-walled insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Eco-friendly and leak-proof.

products.name: Designer Sunglasses
products.description: Premium polarized sunglasses with acetate frames and UV400 protection. Comes with hardshell case and cleaning cloth.

products.name: Smart Watch Pro
products.description: Advanced fitness tracking smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant up to 50m.

products.name: Botanical Scented Candle Set
products.description: Set of three hand-poured soy candles with natural botanical fragrances. Burns for 40+ hours each.

products.name: Yoga Mat Pro
products.description: Extra-thick non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material. Includes carrying strap and alignment markers.

products.name: Minimalist Desk Organizer
products.description: Handcrafted wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for pens, cards, and accessories. Perfect for modern workspaces.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Compact waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery, and built-in microphone for calls.

products.name: Herbal Tea Gift Collection
products.description: Curated collection of 12 premium herbal teas from around the world. Beautifully packaged in a wooden presentation box.
